## SSXServerConfig interface

Configuration interface for ssx-server

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SSXServerConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [providers?](./ssx-core.ssxserverconfig.providers.md) |  | [SSXServerProviders](./ssx-core.ssxserverproviders.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Connection to a cryptographic keypair and/or network. |
|  [signingKey?](./ssx-core.ssxserverconfig.signingkey.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A key used for signing cookies coming from the server. Providing this key enables signed cookies. |
|  [useSecureCookies?](./ssx-core.ssxserverconfig.usesecurecookies.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Changes cookie attributes. Determines whether or not server cookies require HTTPS and sets the SameSite attribute to 'lax'. Defaults to false |
